alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 01 at 7:15PM MST until March 01 at 7:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 745 PM MST. * At 715 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bapchule, or near Sun Lakes, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chandler, Gilbert, Sun Lakes, Queen Creek, Chandler Heights, Bapchule, Gilbert City Hall, Tumbleweed Park, Olberg, Seville, Santan and Sacaton. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 169 and 179. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 151 and 164. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 42 and 47. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
